job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Job Title: Machine Learning/ML Engineer</strong></p><p><strong> Duration: 12 Months</strong>&nbsp;</p><p> <strong>Location: Full Remote</strong></p><p><strong> </strong>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Description:</strong></p><ul><li>Collaborates with ML engineers and other senior architects for ML model onboarding, deployment, Testability and availability for internal clients.</li><li>Write, automate, and execute performance and load running test scripts to measure latency and throughput of ML backend microservices at the edge-gateway with/without cache.</li><li>Help analyze and troubleshoot performance bottlenecks at edge-gateway and ML backend microservices. </li><li>Create client integration script/sample code for internal clients to integrate with gateway service.</li><li>Experience with programming in Java. </li><li>3-5 years of experience in RESTful APIs and distributed systems using Spring frameworks Spring boot.&nbsp;</li><li>Experience with Docker and Kubernetes. </li><li>Experience writing test automation suites using JUnit and Mockito. </li><li>Familiarity with performance testing, write, automate, and execute performance scripts. </li><li>Experience with CI/CD. Proficiency in Jira, Wiki, git, GitHub and Postman, and SOAPUI. Proficiency in JSON, SQL, and regular expressions. </li><li>Familiarity with agile software development lifecycle. </li><li>Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Experience working with multiple stakeholders to produce and review documentation.</li></ul>
